page.title: 02 My Day - 4th July 1985
page.content:
7.00 am I got up and got washed and dressed, Iwore my school uniform, a green and white checked dress and a green jumper.
7.30 am I went down stairs and had breakfast of Sugar Puffs and a piece of toast. After breakfast I read a book. It was Little Women. Then I got ready for school.
8.30 am My dad took me to school in the car. I went with Lucy. When I got to School Lucy and I sat on the playground floor and Lucy read a book I read it too. Then I played with Elizabeth & Amy till it was time to go into school.
